title: Buying ondemand videos that  0.1  and sometimes for free
vulnerability_information:
hello sir 

this is N B Sri Harsha 

I Have found an IDOR  where we can buy ondemand videos for free ( but i tested on 0.1$)


here is what you should do 

go any  ondemand video  like https://vimeo.com/ondemand/snowman


click on buy ! 

start the burp , you wil get an request  like this

hello sir

this is N B Sri Harsha

I Have found an IDOR where we can buy ondemand videos for free ( but i tested on 0.1$)

here is what you should do

go any ondemand video like https://vimeo.com/ondemand/snowman

activities.message:
I Have an objection on bounty ! 

only 260$ for  an IDOR ? i couldnt  digest it !

there are  more than  thousand ondemand videos ,  if i bought all of them  without reporting the bug ?  what you would do ? , there would be a loss ri8 ?

and please check the bounty again !

and  you said "Since this lets you buy both Plus ($60) and PRO ($200) for free, I'm awarding $260 =)"

i was able to buy ondemand videos too , where is bounty for that ?

and still 260$ for  an high potential IDOR  ?  i cant digest it ! , please check the bounty again 

for an IDOR  square bug bounty program paid 3000$  , and i though from this i would get 2k$ like that ,

activities.message:
I'm sorry you're disappointed with the bounty, but at the time this was submitted our guidelines clearly stated that we weren't awarding bounties at all. 

In a few select reports from the past few months we have gone back and awarded bounties to significant security vulnerabilities that affected the privacy of our systems and users. We believe this bounty is consistent with the severity of the bug, the effort required to discover it, as well as how much we have awarded to other reports.
activities.markdown_message:
I'm sorry you're disappointed with the bounty, but at the time this was submitted our guidelines clearly stated that we weren't awarding bounties at all.

In a few select reports from the past few months we have gone back and awarded bounties to significant security vulnerabilities that affected the privacy of our systems and users. We believe this bounty is consistent with the severity of the bug, the effort required to discover it, as well as how much we have awarded to other reports.
